conclusion: Determine the magnitude of the electric field strength at point A of the cube.
Calculate electric field due to 2q at O: E_{2q} = 8kq/L^2.
Calculate electric field due to -q at O: E_{-q} = 4kq/L^2.
Net electric field at O is E_O = 4kq/L^2.
Distance from 2q to A is sqrt(3)L.
Distance from -q to A is sqrt(3)L.
Electric field due to 2q at A: E_{2q,A} = 2kq/3L^2.
Electric field due to -q at A: E_{-q,A} = kq/3L^2.
Net electric field at A is E_A = kq/L^2.
Relate E_A to E: E_A = E/4.
Final answer: The magnitude of the electric field strength at point A is E/4.
